features: ✔[WHITE 4 DARWER DRESSER ] : Overall dimension: 12"D x 15.7"W x 36.5"H.Drawer dimension: 11.1"D x 14.2"W x 7.9"H, each drawer support to 11 lbs,top wood support 35 lbs, tall nightstand for Room.

✔[FABRIC DRAWERS WITH WOOD FRONT]: This white closet dresser drawer organizers has water-resistant wood top and fabric drawers with wood front,elegant look and easy to clean,removable wooden handle.

✔[MODERN WHITE STYLISH FIRNITURE]: The simple and modish design of the bedside furniture matches perfectly with any furnishing style. Could be a nice small piece of furniture to be placed in easy-look place.
✔[EASY ASSEMBLEY AND LIAGHTWEIGHT]: Easy to assemble in half an hour,4 adjustable feet protect your floor from scratches. It's lightweight so you could move to any room you want to be tidier easily.
body.description: BOLUO Dresser with 4 Drawers Tower Sturdy durable structure Anti-tipping system can protect you from any hurt. High-quality strong steel frame; Adjustable feet with plastic cover protect your floor. V-steel frame and XL lacing bar ensure your drawer dresser more stable. Elegant Wooden Handle Not the wooden top, the fabric drawer front is veneered with engineered wood in a rustic look, giving a classy and refined appeal.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Specification： Color: White 12"D x 15.7"W x 36.5"H Material: Fabric drawers, Metal, Particle Board BOLUO Dresser with 4 Drawers Tower Sturdy durable structure Anti-tipping system can protect you from any hurt. High-quality strong steel frame; Adjustable feet with plastic cover protect your floor. V-steel frame and XL lacing bar ensure your drawer dresser more stable. Elegant Wooden Handle Not the wooden top, the fabric drawer front is veneered with engineered wood in a rustic look, giving a classy and refined appeal.

Particleboard & Non-woven fabric High-quality waterproof particleboard is very durable and sturdy. High-grade non-woven foldable fabric drawer within child safety level, keeping things in a good condition is more durable and anti-scratch. Waterproof Wooden Top for Storage Place some daily necessities on it, cups, hats, books, and etc, you will enjoy this space. Use cloth easy to clean. Adjustable Feet Screw-in leveling feet adjust easily on uneven ground and protect the floor from scratches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can't say enough good things!
reviews.reviewText: This shipped fast (arrived a day before it was supposed to) and was very easy to assemble (there are directions, but I put it together without needing to reference them). It is not as sturdy as if it were made from solid wood, but it is sooo cute and looks high end. I love the cloth drawers with wooden faces, because being cloth means they expand to fit things. The drawers are also super roomy, but the overall dimensions make it perfect for my small apartment. I will likely buy a second if I move into a bigger space. Love love love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Awesome dresser easy to install perfect fit for me. Quality is tops

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for small spaces
reviews.reviewText: I love it, the color and look is great, two of the drawers i had to re glue the wood on. Other than that its really nice and barely took anytime to set up.

reviews.reviewerName: Very effective and affordable Very effective and affordable
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product has great quality, it has 5 drawers large enough to contain most of my belongings, it arrived in time and was easy to assemble within a short time period, I strongly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m giving this 1 star because I have no way to contact the seller and this piece was defective. The dresser it’s self is nice and easy to assemble. However when I got to put on the very last knob it does not have the silver lining be be able to screw it in place (see picture). The dresser looks bad now missing 1 knob and there is no other way to open the drawer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and beautiful!
reviews.reviewText: The size, sturdiness and look is perfect! It looks modern and feels strong, the front of each drawer has a wood frame attached to the front which I love that makes it look neat and modern. The side of each drawer also had an attachment that prevents the drawer to completely come off unless unattached. Each drawer has a good amount of space. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Drawers are not great quality
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together. Size wise it fits perfectly in my daughters closet. My only issue is the drawers are fabric, not solid material. So material tears easily and just looks cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My daughter uses it in her dorm!
reviews.reviewText: It was one of the easiest pieces of furniture I've ever built. It is the perfect height for next to my daughter's bed in her dorm. It has a great amount of storage and is super sturdy. She even has a lamp and a fan on top and it holds up great. It also looks super nice and sleek.
